Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties

Interface EntityPropertyBindingContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
EntityPropertyBindingContextResolver
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChildEntityPropertyBindingContext, SimpleEntityPropertyBindingContext
public interface EntityPropertyBindingContext
Represents the binding context information for an entity. Usually contains at least the owning entity (often the original entity), and the target on which it should be bound (often a DTO of the original entity).
Since:
3.2.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme
See Also:
  • EntityPropertyController
  • SimpleEntityPropertyBindingContext
  • ChildEntityPropertyBindingContext

    Method
    Description
    static EntityPropertyBindingContext
    forReading(Object entity)
    Create a readonly binding context for an entity.
    static EntityPropertyBindingContext
    forUpdating(Object entity, Object target)
    Create a binding context for updating an entity, where entity represents the current value, and target the target (usually a DTO) to which the updates should be applied.

  • Method Details

    • getEntity

      <U> U getEntity()
      Get the original entity value.
      Returns:
      original entity cast to specific type

    • getTarget

      <U> U getTarget()
      Get the target to which updates should be applied. Usually only different from getEntity() in a non-readonly context.
      Returns:
      target cast to specific type

    • toPropertyValue

      default EntityPropertyValue toPropertyValue()
      Convert this binding context to an equivalent EntityPropertyValue. The getEntity() will be considered the EntityPropertyValue.getOldValue(), whereas getTarget() will be the EntityPropertyValue.getNewValue(). In case this is not a readonly context and the target is null, but the entity is not, the property value will be flagged as deleted.
      Returns:
      entity property value

    • isReadonly

      boolean isReadonly()
      Indicates if this binding context is meant solely for reading. In this case getTarget() will usually return the same as getEntity().
      Returns:
      true if readonly

    • resolvePropertyValue

      default <U> EntityPropertyValue<U> resolvePropertyValue(@NonNull @NonNull EntityPropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor)
      Resolve the property value for a given property.
      Type Parameters:
      U - type of the property
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - representing the property
      Returns:
      property value, null if not found

    • resolvePropertyBindingContext

      EntityPropertyBindingContext resolvePropertyBindingContext(@NonNull @NonNull EntityPropertyDescriptor propertyDescriptor)
      Resolve a EntityPropertyBindingContext for a specific child property.
      Parameters:
      propertyDescriptor - representing the property
      Returns:
      binding context for the property, null if not found

    • forReading

      static EntityPropertyBindingContext forReading(Object entity)
      Create a readonly binding context for an entity. Both the target and the entity will refer to the same instance, and isReadonly() will return true.
      Parameters:
      entity - for the context
      Returns:
      binding context

    • forUpdating

      static EntityPropertyBindingContext forUpdating(Object entity, Object target)
      Create a binding context for updating an entity, where entity represents the current value, and target the target (usually a DTO) to which the updates should be applied. Property isReadonly() will return false.
      Parameters:
      entity - for the context
      target - for applying the updates to
      Returns:
      binding context
